metadata.name: Game Time Tracker
metadata.description:
Tracks total in-game time played.
Logs your in-game time played. The save#.dat file located in: ".\The Binding of Isaac Rebirth\data\game_time_tracker" should be opened with a text editor to view the amount.
[hr][/hr]
[i]This cannot be enabled to track time played during daily runs.[/i]
[hr][/hr]
Have any ideas? Found a bug? Visit the mod repository @ https://github.com/Fjara-h/game_time_tracker
